title: Configure Single Sign-On (SSO)
description: An enterprise customer requires the product to be configured with their Identity Provider (e.g., Okta) for Single Sign-On.

tasks.description: Obtain the required SSO metadata (e.g., IdP certificate, sign-on URL) from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the necessary SSO configuration details.

tasks.description: Enter the customer's SSO metadata into their account's authentication settings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the SSO settings in the product's admin panel.

tasks.description: Guide the customer through testing the SSO login flow to confirm it is working correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent and customer successfully test and verify the SSO configuration.
